00053         private int thumbSize = 15;
00059         [Description("Set Slider thumb size")]
00060         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00061         [DefaultValue(15)]
00062         public int ThumbSize
00063         {
00064             get { return thumbSize; }
00065             set
00066             {
00067                 if (value > 0 &
00068                     value < (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal ? ClientRectangle.Width : ClientRectangle.Height))
00069                     thumbSize = value;
00070                 else
00071                     throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(
00072                         "ThumbSize", "TrackSize has to be greather than zero and lower than half of Slider width");
00073                 Invalidate();
00074             }
00075         }

00151             {
00152                 if (barOrientation != value)
00153                 {
00154                     barOrientation = value;
00155                     int temp = Width;
00156                     Width = Height;
00157                     Height = temp;
00158                     if (thumbCustomShape != null)
00159                         thumbSize =
00160                             (int)
00161                             (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal
00162                                  ? thumbCustomShape.GetBounds().Width
00163                                  : thumbCustomShape.GetBounds().Height) + 1;
00164                     Invalidate();

00170         private int trackerValue = 50;
00176         [Description("Set Slider value")]
00177         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00178         [DefaultValue(50)]
00179         public int Value
00180         {
00181             get { return trackerValue; }
00182             set
00183             {
00184                 value = Math.Max(barMinimum, Math.Min(value, barMaximum));
00185                 if (value >= barMinimum && value <= barMaximum)
00186                 {
00187                     trackerValue = value;
00188                     if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00189                     Invalidate();
00190                 }
00191                 else throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Value is outside appropriate range (min, max)");
00192             }
00193         }

00214                     {

00220                 else throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Minimal value is greather than maximal one");
00221             }

00509         //define own color schemas
00510         private Color[,] aColorSchema = new Color[,]
00511             {
00512                 {
00513                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.SkyBlue, Color.DarkSlateBlue, Color.Gainsboro,
00514                     Color.DarkGreen, Color.Chartreuse
00515                 },
00516                 {
00517                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.Red, Color.DarkRed, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Coral,
00518                     Color.LightCoral
00519                 },
00520                 {
00521                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.GreenYellow, Color.Yellow, Color.Gold, Color.Orange,
00522                     Color.OrangeRed
00523                 },
00524                 {
00525                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.Red, Color.Crimson, Color.Gainsboro, Color.DarkViolet
00526                     , Color.Violet
00527                 }
00528             };
00529 
00530         public enum ColorSchemas
00531         {
00532             PerlBlueGreen,
00533             PerlRedCoral,
00534             PerlGold,
00535             PerlRoyalColors
00536         }
00537 
00538         private ColorSchemas colorSchema = ColorSchemas.PerlBlueGreen;
00543         [Description("Set Slider color schema. Has no effect when slider colors are changed manually after schema was applied.")]
00544         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00545         [DefaultValue(typeof(ColorSchemas), "PerlBlueGreen")]
00546         public ColorSchemas ColorSchema
00547         {
00548             get { return colorSchema; }
00549             set
00550             {
00551                 colorSchema = value;
00552                 byte sn = (byte)value;
00553                 thumbOuterColor = aColorSchema[sn, 0];
00554                 thumbInnerColor = aColorSchema[sn, 1];
00555                 thumbPenColor = aColorSchema[sn, 2];
00556                 barOuterColor = aColorSchema[sn, 3];
00557                 barInnerColor = aColorSchema[sn, 4];
00558                 barPenColor = aColorSchema[sn, 5];
00559                 elapsedOuterColor = aColorSchema[sn, 6];
00560                 elapsedInnerColor = aColorSchema[sn, 7];
00561 
00562                 Invalidate();
00563             }
00564         }

00576         public ColorSlider(int min, int max, int value)
00577         {
00578             InitializeComponent();
00579             SetStyle(ControlStyles.AllPaintingInWmPaint | ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer |
00580                      ControlStyles.ResizeRedraw | ControlStyles.Selectable |
00581                      ControlStyles.SupportsTransparentBackColor | ControlStyles.UserMouse |
00582                      ControlStyles.UserPaint, true);
00583             BackColor = Color.Transparent;
00584 
00585             Minimum = min;
00586             Maximum = max;
00587             Value = value;
00588         }

00593         public ColorSlider() : this(0, 100, 50) { }

00597         #region Paint
00598 
00603         protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)
00604         {
00605             if (!Enabled)
00606             {
00607                 Color[] desaturatedColors = DesaturateColors(thumbOuterColor, thumbInnerColor, thumbPenColor,
00608                                                              barOuterColor, barInnerColor, barPenColor,
00609                                                              elapsedOuterColor, elapsedInnerColor);
00610                 DrawColorSlider(e, desaturatedColors[0], desaturatedColors[1], desaturatedColors[2],
00611                                 desaturatedColors[3],
00612                                 desaturatedColors[4], desaturatedColors[5], desaturatedColors[6], desaturatedColors[7]);
00613             }
00614             else
00615             {
00616                 if (mouseEffects && mouseInRegion)
00617                 {
00618                     Color[] lightenedColors = LightenColors(thumbOuterColor, thumbInnerColor, thumbPenColor,
00619                                                             barOuterColor, barInnerColor, barPenColor,
00620                                                             elapsedOuterColor, elapsedInnerColor);
00621                     DrawColorSlider(e, lightenedColors[0], lightenedColors[1], lightenedColors[2], lightenedColors[3],
00622                                     lightenedColors[4], lightenedColors[5], lightenedColors[6], lightenedColors[7]);
00623                 }
00624                 else
00625                 {
00626                     DrawColorSlider(e, thumbOuterColor, thumbInnerColor, thumbPenColor,
00627                                     barOuterColor, barInnerColor, barPenColor,
00628                                     elapsedOuterColor, elapsedInnerColor);
00629                 }
00630             }
00631         }
00632 
00645         private void DrawColorSlider(PaintEventArgs e, Color thumbOuterColorPaint, Color thumbInnerColorPaint,
00646                                      Color thumbPenColorPaint, Color barOuterColorPaint, Color barInnerColorPaint,
00647                                      Color barPenColorPaint, Color elapsedOuterColorPaint, Color elapsedInnerColorPaint)
00648         {
00649             //try
00650             {
00651                 //set up thumbRect aproprietly
00652                 if (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal)
00653                 {
00654                     int TrackX = (((trackerValue - barMinimum) * (ClientRectangle.Width - thumbSize)) / (barMaximum - barMinimum));
00655                     thumbRect = new Rectangle(TrackX, 1, thumbSize - 1, ClientRectangle.Height - 3);
00656                 }
00657                 else
00658                 {
00659                     int TrackY = (((trackerValue - barMinimum) * (ClientRectangle.Height - thumbSize)) / (barMaximum - barMinimum));
00660                     thumbRect = new Rectangle(1, TrackY, ClientRectangle.Width - 3, thumbSize - 1);
00661                 }
00662 
00663                 //adjust drawing rects
00664                 barRect = ClientRectangle;
00665                 thumbHalfRect = thumbRect;
00666                 LinearGradientMode gradientOrientation;
00667                 if (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal)
00668                 {
00669                     barRect.Inflate(-1, -barRect.Height / 3);
00670                     barHalfRect = barRect;
00671                     barHalfRect.Height /= 2;
00672                     gradientOrientation = LinearGradientMode.Vertical;
00673                     thumbHalfRect.Height /= 2;
00674                     elapsedRect = barRect;
00675                     elapsedRect.Width = thumbRect.Left + thumbSize / 2;
00676                 }
00677                 else
00678                 {
00679                     barRect.Inflate(-barRect.Width / 3, -1);
00680                     barHalfRect = barRect;
00681                     barHalfRect.Width /= 2;
00682                     gradientOrientation = LinearGradientMode.Horizontal;
00683                     thumbHalfRect.Width /= 2;
00684                     elapsedRect = barRect;
00685                     elapsedRect.Height = thumbRect.Top + thumbSize / 2;
00686                 }
00687                 //get thumb shape path 
00688                 GraphicsPath thumbPath;
00689                 if (thumbCustomShape == null)
00690                     thumbPath = CreateRoundRectPath(thumbRect, thumbRoundRectSize);
00691                 else
00692                 {
00693                     thumbPath = thumbCustomShape;
00694                     Matrix m = new Matrix();
00695                     m.Translate(thumbRect.Left - thumbPath.GetBounds().Left, thumbRect.Top - thumbPath.GetBounds().Top);
00696                     thumbPath.Transform(m);
00697                 }
00698 
00699                 //draw bar
00700                 using (
00701                     LinearGradientBrush lgbBar =
00702                         new LinearGradientBrush(barHalfRect, barOuterColorPaint, barInnerColorPaint, gradientOrientation)
00703                     )
00704                 {
00705                     lgbBar.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00706                     e.Graphics.FillRectangle(lgbBar, barRect);
00707                     //draw elapsed bar
00708                     using (
00709                         LinearGradientBrush lgbElapsed =
00710                             new LinearGradientBrush(barHalfRect, elapsedOuterColorPaint, elapsedInnerColorPaint,
00711                                                     gradientOrientation))
00712                     {
00713                         lgbElapsed.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00714                         if (Capture && drawSemitransparentThumb)
00715                         {
00716                             Region elapsedReg = new Region(elapsedRect);
00717                             elapsedReg.Exclude(thumbPath);
00718                             e.Graphics.FillRegion(lgbElapsed, elapsedReg);
00719                         }
00720                         else
00721                             e.Graphics.FillRectangle(lgbElapsed, elapsedRect);
00722                     }
00723                     //draw bar band                    
00724                     using (Pen barPen = new Pen(barPenColorPaint, 0.5f))
00725                     {
00726                         e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(barPen, barRect);
00727                     }
00728                 }
00729 
00730                 //draw thumb
00731                 Color newthumbOuterColorPaint = thumbOuterColorPaint, newthumbInnerColorPaint = thumbInnerColorPaint;
00732                 if (Capture && drawSemitransparentThumb)
00733                 {
00734                     newthumbOuterColorPaint = Color.FromArgb(175, thumbOuterColorPaint);
00735                     newthumbInnerColorPaint = Color.FromArgb(175, thumbInnerColorPaint);
00736                 }
00737                 using (
00738                     LinearGradientBrush lgbThumb =
00739                         new LinearGradientBrush(thumbHalfRect, newthumbOuterColorPaint, newthumbInnerColorPaint,
00740                                                 gradientOrientation))
00741                 {
00742                     lgbThumb.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00743                     e.Graphics.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;
00744                     e.Graphics.FillPath(lgbThumb, thumbPath);
00745                     //draw thumb band
00746                     Color newThumbPenColor = thumbPenColorPaint;
00747                     if (mouseEffects && (Capture || mouseInThumbRegion))
00748                         newThumbPenColor = ControlPaint.Dark(newThumbPenColor);
00749                     using (Pen thumbPen = new Pen(newThumbPenColor))
00750                     {
00751                         e.Graphics.DrawPath(thumbPen, thumbPath);
00752                     }
00753                     //gp.Dispose();                    
00754                     /*if (Capture || mouseInThumbRegion)
00755                         using (LinearGradientBrush lgbThumb2 = new LinearGradientBrush(thumbHalfRect, Color.FromArgb(150, Color.Blue), Color.Transparent, gradientOrientation))
00756                         {
00757                             lgbThumb2.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00758                             e.Graphics.FillPath(lgbThumb2, gp);
00759                         }*/
00760                 }
00761 
00762                 //draw focusing rectangle
00763                 if (Focused & drawFocusRectangle)
00764                     using (Pen p = new Pen(Color.FromArgb(200, barPenColorPaint)))
00765                     {
00766                         p.DashStyle = DashStyle.Dot;
00767                         Rectangle r = ClientRectangle;
00768                         r.Width -= 2;
00769                         r.Height--;
00770                         r.X++;
00771                         //ControlPaint.DrawFocusRectangle(e.Graphics, r);                        
00772                         using (GraphicsPath gpBorder = CreateRoundRectPath(r, borderRoundRectSize))
00773                         {
00774                             e.Graphics.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;
00775                             e.Graphics.DrawPath(p, gpBorder);
00776                         }
00777                     }
00778             }
00779                         //catch (ArgumentOutOfRangeException Err)
00780                         //{
00781                         //    Console.WriteLine("DrawBackGround Error in " + Name + ":" + Err.Message);
00782                         //}
00783                         //finally
00784                         //{
00785                         //}
00786         }
00787 
00788         #endregion
00789 
00790         #region Overided events
00791 
00792         private bool mouseInRegion = false;
00797         protected override void OnEnabledChanged(EventArgs e)
00798         {
00799             base.OnEnabledChanged(e);
00800             Invalidate();
00801         }
00802 
00807         protected override void OnMouseEnter(EventArgs e)
00808         {
00809             base.OnMouseEnter(e);
00810             mouseInRegion = true;
00811             Invalidate();
00812         }
00813 
00818         protected override void OnMouseLeave(EventArgs e)
00819         {
00820             base.OnMouseLeave(e);
00821             mouseInRegion = false;
00822             mouseInThumbRegion = false;
00823             Invalidate();
00824         }
00825 
00830         protected override void OnMouseDown(MouseEventArgs e)
00831         {
00832             base.OnMouseDown(e);
00833             if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)
00834             {
00835                 Capture = true;
00836                 if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.ThumbTrack, trackerValue));
00837                 if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00838                 OnMouseMove(e);
00839             }
00840         }
00841 
00842         private bool mouseInThumbRegion = false;
00843 
00848         protected override void OnMouseMove(MouseEventArgs e)
00849         {
00850             base.OnMouseMove(e);
00851             mouseInThumbRegion = IsPointInRect(e.Location, thumbRect);
00852             if (Capture & e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)
00853             {
00854                 ScrollEventType set = ScrollEventType.ThumbPosition;
00855                 Point pt = e.Location;
00856                 int p = barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal ? pt.X : pt.Y;
00857                 int margin = thumbSize >> 1;
00858                 p -= margin;
00859                 float coef = (float)(barMaximum - barMinimum) /
00860                              (float)
00861                              ((barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal ? ClientSize.Width : ClientSize.Height) -
00862                               2 * margin);
00863                 trackerValue = (int)(p * coef + barMinimum);
00864 
00865                 if (trackerValue <= barMinimum)
00866                 {
00867                     trackerValue = barMinimum;
00868                     set = ScrollEventType.First;
00869                 }
00870                 else if (trackerValue >= barMaximum)
00871                 {
00872                     trackerValue = barMaximum;
00873                     set = ScrollEventType.Last;
00874                 }
00875 
00876                 if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(set, trackerValue));
00877                 if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00878             }
00879             Invalidate();
00880         }
00881 
00886         protected override void OnMouseUp(MouseEventArgs e)
00887         {
00888             base.OnMouseUp(e);
00889             Capture = false;
00890             mouseInThumbRegion = IsPointInRect(e.Location, thumbRect);
00891             if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.EndScroll, trackerValue));
00892             if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00893             Invalidate();
00894         }
00895 
00900         protected override void OnMouseWheel(MouseEventArgs e)
00901         {
00902             base.OnMouseWheel(e);
00903             int v = e.Delta / 120 * (barMaximum - barMinimum) / mouseWheelBarPartitions;
00904             SetProperValue(Value + v);
00905         }
00906 
00911         protected override void OnGotFocus(EventArgs e)
00912         {
00913             base.OnGotFocus(e);
00914             Invalidate();
00915         }
00916 
00921         protected override void OnLostFocus(EventArgs e)
00922         {
00923             base.OnLostFocus(e);
00924             Invalidate();
00925         }
00926 
00931         protected override void OnKeyUp(KeyEventArgs e)
00932         {
00933             base.OnKeyUp(e);
00934             switch (e.KeyCode)
00935             {
00936                 case Keys.Down:
00937                 case Keys.Left:
00938                     SetProperValue(Value - (int)smallChange);
00939                     if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.SmallDecrement, Value));
00940                     break;
00941                 case Keys.Up:
00942                 case Keys.Right:
00943                     SetProperValue(Value + (int)smallChange);
00944                     if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.SmallIncrement, Value));
00945                     break;
00946                 case Keys.Home:
00947                     Value = barMinimum;
00948                     break;
00949                 case Keys.End:
00950                     Value = barMaximum;
00951                     break;
00952                 case Keys.PageDown:
00953                     SetProperValue(Value - (int)largeChange);
00954                     if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.LargeDecrement, Value));
00955                     break;
00956                 case Keys.PageUp:
00957                     SetProperValue(Value + (int)largeChange);
00958                     if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.LargeIncrement, Value));
00959                     break;
00960             }
00961             if (Scroll != null && Value == barMinimum) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.First, Value));
00962             if (Scroll != null && Value == barMaximum) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.Last, Value));
00963             Point pt = PointToClient(Cursor.Position);
00964             OnMouseMove(new MouseEventArgs(MouseButtons.None, 0, pt.X, pt.Y, 0));
00965         }
00966 
00974         protected override bool ProcessDialogKey(Keys keyData)
00975         {
00976             if (keyData == Keys.Tab | ModifierKeys == Keys.Shift)
00977                 return base.ProcessDialogKey(keyData);
00978             else
00979             {
00980                 OnKeyDown(new KeyEventArgs(keyData));
00981                 return true;
00982             }
00983         }
00984 
00985         #endregion
00986 
00987         #region Help routines
00988 
00995         public static GraphicsPath CreateRoundRectPath(Rectangle rect, Size size)
00996         {
00997             GraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath();
00998             gp.AddLine(rect.Left + size.Width / 2, rect.Top, rect.Right - size.Width / 2, rect.Top);
00999             gp.AddArc(rect.Right - size.Width, rect.Top, size.Width, size.Height, 270, 90);
01000 
01001             gp.AddLine(rect.Right, rect.Top + size.Height / 2, rect.Right, rect.Bottom - size.Width / 2);
01002             gp.AddArc(rect.Right - size.Width, rect.Bottom - size.Height, size.Width, size.Height, 0, 90);
01003 
01004             gp.AddLine(rect.Right - size.Width / 2, rect.Bottom, rect.Left + size.Width / 2, rect.Bottom);
01005             gp.AddArc(rect.Left, rect.Bottom - size.Height, size.Width, size.Height, 90, 90);
01006 
01007             gp.AddLine(rect.Left, rect.Bottom - size.Height / 2, rect.Left, rect.Top + size.Height / 2);
01008             gp.AddArc(rect.Left, rect.Top, size.Width, size.Height, 180, 90);
01009             return gp;
01010         }
01011 
01017         public static Color[] DesaturateColors(params Color[] colorsToDesaturate)
01018         {
01019             Color[] colorsToReturn = new Color[colorsToDesaturate.Length];
01020             for (int i = 0; i < colorsToDesaturate.Length; i++)
01021             {
01022                 //use NTSC weighted avarage
01023                 int gray =
01024                     (int)(colorsToDesaturate[i].R * 0.3 + colorsToDesaturate[i].G * 0.6 + colorsToDesaturate[i].B * 0.1);
01025                 colorsToReturn[i] = Color.FromArgb(-0x010101 * (255 - gray) - 1);
01026             }
01027             return colorsToReturn;
01028         }
01029 
01035         public static Color[] LightenColors(params Color[] colorsToLighten)
01036         {
01037             Color[] colorsToReturn = new Color[colorsToLighten.Length];
01038             for (int i = 0; i < colorsToLighten.Length; i++)
01039             {
01040                 colorsToReturn[i] = ControlPaint.Light(colorsToLighten[i]);
01041             }
01042             return colorsToReturn;
01043         }
01044 
01049         private void SetProperValue(int val)
01050         {
01051             if (val < barMinimum) Value = barMinimum;
01052             else if (val > barMaximum) Value = barMaximum;
01053             else Value = val;
01054         }
01055 
01064         private static bool IsPointInRect(Point pt, Rectangle rect)
01065         {
01066             if (pt.X > rect.Left & pt.X < rect.Right & pt.Y > rect.Top & pt.Y < rect.Bottom)
01067                 return true;
01068             else return false;
01069         }

01071         #endregion
01072     }
